articles.title: Sonic Colors Ultimate Physical Release Delayed In Europe - PlayStation Universe
articles.description: The Sonic Colors Ultimate physical release has been postponed in Europe, SEGA has announced.
articles.content:
SEGA has confirmed that the physical version of Sonic Colors Ultimate has been delayed in European territories.
While there’s no new date in sight for those who wish to pick up the game at brick-and… [+892 chars]

articles.author: Edmund DeMarche
articles.title: Biden faces pressure from allies on Afghanistan deadline prior to G7 meeting, Taliban issues warning - Fox News
articles.description: European allies are applying pressure on the Biden administration to extend the Aug. 31 deadline for withdrawing from Afghanistan despite warnings from the Taliban against crossing a “red line,” according to a report.

articles.title: European markets edge higher on Pfizer vaccine approval and easing taper worries - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks edged higher on Tuesday as investors took heart from the U.S. FDA's full approval of the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine.
articles.content: LONDON European stocks edged higher on Tuesday as investors took heart from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration's full approval of the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine and calming worries about imminent tap… [+2119 chars]

articles.title: Climate change: Europe's extreme rains made more likely by humans - BBC News
articles.description: Heavy rainfall that led to deadly floods in Germany and Belgium was influenced by human induced warming.
articles.content:
By Matt McGrathEnvironment correspondent
The heavy rainfall behind deadly flooding in Europe in July was made more likely by climate change, scientists say.

articles.title: 'The best one' - Chelsea's Lukaku relishes goal on Premier League return - SuperSport
articles.description: Chelsea striker Romelu Lukaku said his goal in Sunday's 2-0 win over London rivals Arsenal, the Belgium international's first match back with the European champions.
